acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders correctly on mobile and desktop and includes: business name, tagline, location, operator name, and phone/WhatsApp contact info.
All listed service categories from the provided content are displayed in a readable, scannable layout (e.g., grouped sections/cards).
Phone number is clickable (tel:) and WhatsApp action is available via a link (wa.me) using the provided number.

requirements.text: Add a clear navigation structure (single-page sections or multi-page, developer choice) that at minimum includes: Home/Intro, Services, Why Choose Us, Contact/Address, and a Form section.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links scroll or route to the correct sections/pages.
Contact/Address section includes the provided address text and operator/contact details.

requirements.text: Implement a website form for customer inquiries that supports both ‚ÄúContact‚Äù and ‚ÄúService request‚Äù use cases by including an Inquiry Type field (e.g., dropdown) along with name, phone number, optional email, message/details, and optional service/category selection.
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes: Inquiry Type, Name, Phone, Message/Details (email optional).
Client-side validation prevents submission when required fields are missing and shows clear inline error messages.
On successful submission, user sees a success state and the form resets.
Submissions are sent to the Motoko backend and persisted in stable storage.

requirements.text: Create backend endpoints in the single Motoko main actor to accept and store form submissions (timestamped) and to retrieve submissions for basic internal review (no public display unless explicitly enabled).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes an update method to create a submission and returns an ID or success result.
Backend stores submissions in stable state so data persists across canister upgrades.

Backend exposes a query method to list submissions (may be restricted to authenticated/admin users if Internet Identity is already available in the template; otherwise leave it unexposed in UI and document as a canister method).

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for a local digital services center. Avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors. Use Tailwind + existing UI components without editing any immutable component source files.
acceptanceCriteria: The UI has a consistent theme across sections (buttons, headings, cards, spacing).
Primary palette is not blue/purple (e.g., use warm neutrals with saffron/green accents).
No changes are made to files under the immutable frontend paths; components are composed/used as-is.

requirements.text: Add a simple footer with business name, location, operator name, and contact number, plus a brief disclaimer line (e.g., ‚ÄòService availability may vary by government portal status.‚Äô).
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all pages/at the bottom of the single-page layout.
Footer contains the specified business details and a short disclaimer sentence.

requirements.text: Render newly generated static images (from frontend/public/assets/generated) in the site layout (hero and logo/mark) without routing images through the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated hero image and logo are included as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Images display crisply on mobile and desktop and do not break layout.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text in this build request (implementation may include the provided Hindi content as-is).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths; compose existing UI components instead.
No third-party email/SMS/WhatsApp messaging integrations; store form submissions on-canister instead.
nonGoals: Third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is allowed if needed later).

required: Minimal vector-style logo/mark featuring a small storefront + document motif, warm neutral palette with saffron/green accents (vaishnavi-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner illustration of a local digital services counter with subtle government-document icons, clean modern flat style (vaishnavi-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
